pii_summary: 정규식 기준 민감 PII 패턴 미탐지

redacted_log: 2025-11-17T10:38:00.009Z CRM[export] INFO user=crm_admin op=export object=customer rows=1919 fields="name,phone,email" filter="recent_signup&vip" format=xlsx
